custom-templates-path-comment: Optional path to override the custom templates, folder needs subdirectories.
custom-templates-path-comment-3: Subdirectories must contain directories of components with matching names of subtypes in query
override-templates-path-comment: Optional path to override the overriding templates, folder needs subdirectories
override-templates-path-comment-3: Subdirectories must contain directories of components with matching names of subtypes in query
